hero_tagline: Premium quality LED light tubes for any space
product_description: The Valoputki LED light tube is a premium-quality lighting solution that combines energy efficiency with beautiful illumination. Perfect for both residential and commercial spaces.
reviews_js_notice: Reviews require JavaScript — refresh the page if you want to vote.
event_pickup_info: Visit our booth daily from 12:00 PM - 6:00 PM. Bring your order confirmation.
event_about_text: Valon Kaupunki (City of Light) is an annual festival celebrating illumination and light art in Jyväskylä. The event transforms the city into a dazzling display of light installations, performances, and interactive experiences.
event_pickup_cta_text: By choosing "Pick-up at Valon Kaupunki event" in your cart, you can save on shipping costs and collect your Valoputki LED tubes directly from our booth during the event.
event_special_offer_text: Get 10% off when you purchase 5 or more Valoputki tubes at the event!
feature_affordable_text: At just €5 per tube, our Valoputki LED lights offer exceptional value without compromising on quality.
feature_reliable_text: Our LED tubes are built to last with high-quality components and rigorous testing standards.
feature_bilingual_text: Our customer service team provides support in both Finnish and English to assist you with any questions.
q_shipping: What are the shipping options and costs?
a_shipping: We offer standard shipping for €2.50 to all locations in Finland. Delivery typically takes 3-5 business days. For customers attending the Valon Kaupunki event, you can select "Pick-up at event" during checkout to waive the shipping fee and collect your order directly from our booth.
a_warranty: No warranty provided. If your product fails, contact our support with proof of purchase and we will assist with the warranty claim process.
q_returns: Can I return the product if I'm not satisfied?
a_returns: Yes, we offer a 14-day return policy for unused products in their original packaging. To initiate a return, contact customer service within 14 days. You are responsible for return shipping unless the return is due to our error or a defective product.
a_dimmable: Yes, our Valoputki LED tubes are dimmable when used with a compatible LED dimmer switch. Not all dimmers work with LED lighting; check compatibility.
a_bulk: We currently offer a 10% discount when purchasing 5 or more Valoputki tubes at the Valon Kaupunki event. For larger bulk orders (20+ units), contact our sales team at joona.ahonen1@cygnnet.fi.
footer_about: Premium LED lighting solutions for homes and businesses.
footer_newsletter_text: Subscribe to our newsletter for updates and special offers.
testimonial_1: "High quality product and excellent customer service!" – Maija, Jyväskylä
testimonial_2: "Very energy efficient and stylish solution." – Pekka, Helsinki
testimonial_3: "I warmly recommend it to all LED light tube enthusiasts." – Liisa, Tampere
